contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 8, 1997 D Stroud Brass Band Festival (Third Section)
Stroud Brass Band Festival (Third Section) 30 Entertainments Contest Stroud Brass Band Festival stroud-brass-band-festival-third-section
Stratford Park Leisure Centre, Stroud, Gloucestershire, England, UK Best soloist - trombone - Stourport. Best section - cornets - Pontardulais. Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £100, 3rd £75. 5 bands competed.
July 9, 2011, 8:27 p.m. July 7, 2020, 9:10 p.m.
1 Pontardulais Town Band Ceri Thomas
2 Shipston Town Band Dave Lea
3 Stourport-on-Severn Brass Band David Bishop-Rowe
4 Ynyshir Band F. W. Nicholas
5 City of Bristol Brass Band Peter Vann
